text:
Ali Mufuruki (1958 – December 7, 2019) was a Tanzanian businessman, author, founder and board member of several organisations. He was was the founder of Infotech Investment Group. He was the board chairman of Vodacom Tanzania and Wananchi Group Holdings. He was the co-author of the book "Tanzania's Industrialisation Journey, 2016–2056".
He died on 7 December 2019 at the Morningside Hospital in Johannesburg.
